title: UP to cut pollution with fleet of electric buses
description: The Uttar Pradesh government will introduce a fleet of electric buses, including double-decker ones, in Lucknow during the Navratri festival. These buses aim to enhance commuting and reduce pollution. The initiative will expand to other districts, with intercity electric buses planned for the Kumbh Mela next year.
